title: Noida
summary: Noida, short for New Okhla Industrial Development Authority, is a planned city[5] located in Gautam Buddh Nagar district of the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It is a satellite city of Delhi and is a part of the National Capital Region (NCR) of India. As per provisional reports of Census of India, the population of Noida in 2011 was 642,381.[6] The city is managed by New Okhla Industrial Development Authority (NOIDA).[7] The district's administrative headquarters are in the nearby city of Greater Noida.
